Entries.Graveyard.000: Hey, @. Fall is a busy season for us ghosts. Is something up?
Entries.Music.000: %Charles' music is too loud to hear you.
Entries.Bag.000: %Charles is busy sorting through his bag. Better not distract him.
Entries.Reading.000: Hey, @. Here to help with research?
Entries.Batswing.000: I like to practice in case we ever run into any monsters. 'S why I'm the brawn, innit?
Entries.Waterside.000: %Charles looks lost in thought and doesn't see you.
Entries.Saloon.000: Betcha you can't beat my high score. I've been playing since before you were born.
Entries.Painting.000: These runes can be a bit tricky if you don't know what you're doing. Edwin usually lets me handle them.
